messages.content: Hi
Hey there! To ensure we can connect if we get disconnected, can you please share your email address?
My email is ahmad2720000@gmail.com
Thanks a ton for sharing your email, Ahmad! Could you please tell me a bit about what kind of sign you're looking for — and any other details you'd like us to know?
i want a 4 by 4 metallic sign in 50 days

Gotcha! To create an accurate mockup and quote, I just need a few more details. 

What are the desired measurements for the sign? (I see you mentioned 4 by 4, which is great!) 

Just confirming, is that in feet or inches?
Feet

That's perfect! Thanks for clarifying that it's in feet. 

Do you have any material preferences for the sign — like metal, acrylic, or something else?
metal

Awesome! I see you're going with metal — great choice! 

Now, where will this sign be installed? On a brick wall, concrete, drywall, or another type of surface?
drywall

Thanks for that! So, we have a 4 by 4 feet metal sign that will be installed on drywall. 

Our standard turnaround time is fifteen to seventeen business days. Do you have any deadlines or specific dates by which you need the sign to be delivered?
50 daya

Perfect — we'll make sure it's delivered on time! 

Is the sign going to be installed indoors or outdoors?
Outdoors

Got it! So, the sign will be installed outdoors. 

Now, in which city and state do you want the sign to be delivered?
Tuijana Mexico

Thanks for that! So, the sign will be delivered to Tijuana, Mexico. 

Do you have a price point or a budget in mind for this sign?

That's perfect! Thank you for sharing your budget of $1000. 

Now, do you have any existing logo files or design elements you'd like to incorporate into your sign? If so, please upload them so our designers can work with your brand assets.
I've uploaded my logo: Screenshot 2025-05-30 160926.png

Awesome! I see that you've uploaded your logo. Thank you for that! 

Now, are there any specific colors, fonts, or styles you prefer for the sign?
